title: Chia Pudding with Yummi Nuts Omega Mix
ingredients: 1 tablespoon of natural or artificial sweetener
2 tablespoons chopped Yummi Nuts Omega Mix
As toppings add your favorite fruit and Yummi Nuts Omega Mix
instructions: Step 1: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl and place in the refrigerator for 30 minutes
Step 2: When you go to eat it, add the toppings
